name: Small Ship, Big Guns
description:
12.10.2015: New version (0.9) release!

Small Ship, Big Guns is a vertically scrolling, old-school SHMUP with dynamic and lavish explosion effects. Collect points, unlock new levels and weapons with your points to score even bigger points.

Small Ship, Big Guns features 4 weapons, each with their own destructive effects; normal shots to start with, power shots for rapid destruction, missiles to wipe out the screen of all enemies and lastly, the incomparable disintegrator!

Try the Browser(HTML5) demo!

Keys

'tab' during play to show keys.
Cursor keys for movement
'z' for normal shots
'x' for powershots
'c' for missiles
'v' for disintegration ray
'left shift' for toggling normal shots autofire
'p' for pausation
